column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////So I've come to stand still
column2: to which family owned Pizzeria serves up the best deep dish. Both are fantastic and both are affordable as a family of 4 can fill up on a medium pie. While the prices may seem steep ($20-$30) you can
column4: stuffed with 1 slice. I thought I was going to be pizza-d out for awhile and as I type this
column5: I'm already craving a slice...Lou Malnatis for the Tie!
